scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 $(jq -r .name package.json) --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json)
scripts.deploy-studio:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ $(jq -r .name package.json)-mainnet  --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json) --network mainnet
scripts.deploy-studio:sepolia: graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ $(jq -r .name package.json)-sepolia  --version-label $(jq -r .version package.json) --network sepolia
